EmailTemplate.name: Gated Content: 2021_04_RET_SCOGeneral Webinar 3 Infographic Emails.08-12-21 RET
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Webinar Replay: Extreme Convenience in Retail
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Sorry we missed you at the Extreme Retail Convenience panel discussion. It was an engaging deep dive with moderator Clifford Gumkowski – VP Americas for NCR Retail sales, talking to: - Neil Stern (CEO, The Good Food Holdings) - Amanda Lai (Food and Retail Practice Lead, McMillanDoolittle) and - Kalyna Stiles (Global Senior Director of Store Transformation, NCR) About new changes (and challenges) in the retail industry—and practical solutions available now. Watch the session <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/self-checkout-product-family/panel-webinar-replay?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2021_SCOGeneral_Retail&utm_content=Email3a&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=SCO]]> replay below. <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/self-checkout-product-family/webinar-replay?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2021_SCOGeneral_Retail&utm_content=Email3b&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=SCO]]> ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
